article_title: Indiana Pizzeria Scandal: 11 Other Fast-Food Controversies to Chew On (Photos)
article_text:
Indiana-based pizzeria Memories Pizza found itself at the center of controversy this week, when it was announced that the company would not cater same-sex weddings following the passage of Indiana's Religious Freedom Restoration Act.

The company can at least take comfort in the knowledge that it's not alone. Here are 11 other food-related scandals that left some people choking on outrage.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Tim Kenneally
article_metadata.description: When questionably nutritious eats meet questionably tasteful corporate action

article_summary:
Here are 11 other food-related scandals that left some people choking on outrage.
Indiana-based pizzeria Memories Pizza found itself at the center of controversy this week, when it was announced that the company would not cater same-sex weddings following the passage of Indiana's Religious Freedom Restoration Act.
The company can at least take comfort in the knowledge that it's not alone.
